info.title: Xero Accounting API - Invoices
info.description: Xero Accounting API endpoints for managing invoices

get.summary: Retrieves sales invoices or purchase bills

parameters.name: IDs
parameters.description: Filter by a comma-separated list of InvoicesIDs.

parameters.name: InvoiceNumbers
parameters.description: Filter by a comma-separated list of InvoiceNumbers.

parameters.name: ContactIDs
parameters.description: Filter by a comma-separated list of ContactIDs.

parameters.name: Statuses
parameters.description: Filter by a comma-separated list Statuses. For faster response times we recommend using these explicit parameters instead of passing OR conditions into the Where filter.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: e.g. page=1 – Up to 100 invoices will be returned in a single API call with line items shown for each invoice

parameters.name: includeArchived
parameters.description: e.g. includeArchived=true - Invoices with a status of ARCHIVED will be included in the response

parameters.name: createdByMyApp
parameters.description: When set to true you'll only retrieve Invoices created by your app

200.description: Success - return response of type Invoices array with all Invoices

put.summary: Creates one or more sales invoices or purchase bills

requestBody.description: Invoices with an array of invoice objects in body of request

200.description: Success - return response of type Invoices array with newly created Invoice

post.summary: Updates or creates one or more sales invoices or purchase bills

200.description: Success - return response of type Invoices array with newly created Invoice

get.summary: Retrieves a specific sales invoice or purchase bill using a unique invoice Id

200.description: Success - return response of type Invoices array with specified Invoices

post.summary: Updates a specific sales invoices or purchase bills

200.description: Success - return response of type Invoices array with updated Invoice

get.summary: Retrieves invoices or purchase bills as PDF files

200.description: Success - return response of byte array pdf version of specified Invoices

get.summary: Retrieves attachments for a specific invoice or purchase bill

200.description: Success - return response of type Attachments array of Attachments for specified Invoices

get.summary: Retrieves a specific attachment from a specific invoices or purchase bills by using a unique attachment Id

200.description: Success - return response of attachment for Invoice as binary data

get.summary: Retrieves an attachment from a specific invoice or purchase bill by filename

200.description: Success - return response of attachment for Invoice as binary data

post.summary: Updates an attachment from a specific invoices or purchase bill by filename

requestBody.description: Byte array of file in body of request

200.description: Success - return response of type Attachments array with updated Attachment

put.summary: Creates an attachment for a specific invoice or purchase bill by filename

requestBody.description: Byte array of file in body of request

200.description: Success - return response of type Attachments array with newly created Attachment

get.summary: Retrieves a URL to an online invoice

200.description: Success - return response of type OnlineInvoice array with one OnlineInvoice

post.summary: Sends a copy of a specific invoice to related contact via email

get.summary: Retrieves history records for a specific invoice

put.summary: Creates a history record for a specific invoice

200.description: Success - return response of Invoice Reminders

scopes.accounting.transactions: Grant read-write access to bank transactions, credit notes, invoices, repeating invoices
scopes.accounting.settings: Grant read-write access to organisation and account settings
scopes.accounting.settings.read: Grant read-only access to organisation and account settings

ContentType.name: contentType
ContentType.description: The mime type of the attachment file you are retrieving i.e image/jpg, application/pdf

summarizeErrors.name: summarizeErrors
summarizeErrors.description: If false return 200 OK and mix of successfully created objects and any with validation errors

unitdp.name: unitdp
unitdp.description: e.g. unitdp=4 – (Unit Decimal Places) You can opt in to use four decimal places for unit amounts

ifModifiedSince.name: If-Modified-Since
ifModifiedSince.description: Only records created or modified since this timestamp will be returned

idempotencyKey.name: Idempotency-Key
idempotencyKey.description: This allows you to safely retry requests without the risk of duplicate processing. 128 character max.

includeOnline.name: IncludeOnline
includeOnline.description: Allows an attachment to be seen by the end customer within their online invoice

summaryOnly.name: summaryOnly
summaryOnly.description: Use summaryOnly=true in GET Contacts and Invoices endpoint to retrieve a smaller version of the response object. This returns only lightweight fields, excluding computation-heavy fields from the response, making the API calls quick and efficient.

searchTerm.name: searchTerm
searchTerm.description: Search parameter that performs a case-insensitive text search across the fields e.g. InvoiceNumber, Reference.

pageSize.name: pageSize
pageSize.description: Number of records to retrieve per page

historyRecords.description: HistoryRecords containing an array of HistoryRecord objects in body of request

400Error.description: A failed request due to validation error

HistoryRecordCreated.description: Success - return response of type HistoryRecords array of HistoryRecord objects

HistoryRetrieved.description: Success - return response of HistoryRecords array of 0 to N HistoryRecord

Warnings.description: Displays array of warning messages from the API

Date.description: Date invoice was issued – YYYY-MM-DD. If the Date element is not specified it will default to the current date based on the timezone setting of the organisation

InvoiceNumber.description: ACCREC – Unique alpha numeric code identifying invoice (when missing will auto-generate from your Organisation Invoice Settings) (max length = 255)

Url.description: URL link to a source document – shown as "Go to [appName]" in the Xero app

CurrencyRate.description: The currency rate for a multicurrency invoice. If no rate is specified, the XE.com day rate is used. (max length = [18].[6])

SentToContact.description: Boolean to set whether the invoice in the Xero app should be marked as "sent". This can be set only on invoices that have been approved

ExpectedPaymentDate.description: Shown on sales invoices (Accounts Receivable) when this has been set

PlannedPaymentDate.description: Shown on bills (Accounts Payable) when this has been set

CISRate.description: CIS Deduction rate for the organisation

Total.description: Total of Invoice tax inclusive (i.e. SubTotal + TotalTax). This will be ignored if it doesn't equal the sum of the LineAmounts

TotalDiscount.description: Total of discounts applied on the invoice line items

InvoiceID.description: Xero generated unique identifier for invoice

RepeatingInvoiceID.description: Xero generated unique identifier for repeating invoices

HasAttachments.description: boolean to indicate if an invoice has an attachment

IsDiscounted.description: boolean to indicate if an invoice has a discount

AmountDue.description: Amount remaining to be paid on invoice

AmountPaid.description: Sum of payments received for invoice

FullyPaidOnDate.description: The date the invoice was fully paid. Only returned on fully paid invoices

AmountCredited.description: Sum of all credit notes, over-payments and pre-payments applied to invoice

CreditNotes.description: Details of credit notes that have been applied to an invoice

Attachments.description: Displays array of attachments from the API

HasErrors.description: A boolean to indicate if a invoice has an validation errors

StatusAttributeString.description: A string to indicate if a invoice status

ValidationErrors.description: Displays array of validation error messages from the API

Warnings.description: Displays array of warning messages from the API

InvoiceAddresses.description: An array of addresses used to auto calculate sales tax

ContactNumber.description: This can be updated via the API only i.e. This field is read only on the Xero contact screen, used to identify contacts in external systems (max length = 50). If the Contact Number is used, this is displayed as Contact Code in the Contacts UI in Xero.

AccountNumber.description: A user defined account number. This can be updated via the API and the Xero UI (max length = 50)

ContactStatus.description: Current status of a contact – see contact status types

FirstName.description: First name of contact person (max length = 255)

LastName.description: Last name of contact person (max length = 255)

EmailAddress.description: Email address of contact person (umlauts not supported) (max length  = 255)

TaxNumber.description: Tax number of contact – this is also known as the ABN (Australia), GST Number (New Zealand), VAT Number (UK) or Tax ID Number (US and global) in the Xero UI depending on which regionalized version of Xero you are using (max length = 50)

Addresses.description: Store certain address types for a contact – see address types

Phones.description: Store certain phone types for a contact – see phone types

IsSupplier.description: true or false – Boolean that describes if a contact that has any AP  invoices entered against them. Cannot be set via PUT or POST – it is automatically set when an accounts payable invoice is generated against this contact.

IsCustomer.description: true or false – Boolean that describes if a contact has any AR invoices entered against them. Cannot be set via PUT or POST – it is automatically set when an accounts receivable invoice is generated against this contact.

UpdatedDateUTC.description: UTC timestamp of last update to contact

HasValidationErrors.description: A boolean to indicate if a contact has an validation errors

IncludeInEmails.description: boolean to indicate whether contact should be included on emails with invoices etc.

Description.description: Description needs to be at least 1 char long. A line item with just a description (i.e no unit amount or quantity) can be created by specifying just a <Description> element that contains at least 1 character

AccountID.description: The associated account ID related to this line item

TaxAmount.description: The tax amount is auto calculated as a percentage of the line amount (see below) based on the tax rate. This value can be overriden if the calculated <TaxAmount> is not correct.

LineAmount.description: If you wish to omit either the Quantity or UnitAmount you can provide a LineAmount and Xero will calculate the missing amount for you. The line amount reflects the discounted price if either a DiscountRate or DiscountAmount has been used i.e. LineAmount = Quantity * Unit Amount * ((100 - DiscountRate)/100) or LineAmount = (Quantity * UnitAmount) - DiscountAmount

Tracking.description: Optional Tracking Category – see Tracking.  Any LineItem can have a  maximum of 2 <TrackingCategory> elements.

DiscountRate.description: Percentage discount being applied to a line item (only supported on  ACCREC invoices – ACC PAY invoices and credit notes in Xero do not support discounts

DiscountAmount.description: Discount amount being applied to a line item. Only supported on ACCREC invoices and quotes. ACCPAY invoices and credit notes in Xero do not support discounts.

RepeatingInvoiceID.description: The Xero identifier for a Repeating Invoice

SalesTaxCodeId.description: The ID of the sales tax code

TaxBreakdown.description: An array of tax components defined for this line item

Name.description: The name of the item (max length = 50)

ItemID.description: The Xero identifier for an Item

TrackingCategoryID.description: The Xero identifier for a tracking category

TrackingOptionID.description: The Xero identifier for a tracking category option

Name.description: The name of the tracking category

TaxComponentId.description: The unique ID number of this component

NonTaxableAmount.description: The amount that is not taxable

StateAssignedNo.description: The state assigned number of the jurisdiction

JurisdictionRegion.description: Name identifying the region within the country

LineAmountTypes.description: Line amounts are exclusive of tax by default if you don't specify this element. See Line Amount Types

CurrencyCode.description: 3 letter alpha code for the currency – see list of currency codes

PaymentID.description: The Xero identifier for an Payment e.g. 297c2dc5-cc47-4afd-8ec8-74990b8761e9

Date.description: Date the payment is being made (YYYY-MM-DD) e.g. 2009-09-06

Amount.description: The amount of the payment. Must be less than or equal to the outstanding amount owing on the invoice e.g. 200.00

Reference.description: An optional description for the payment e.g. Direct Debit

CurrencyRate.description: Exchange rate when payment is received. Only used for non base currency invoices and credit notes e.g. 0.7500

HasAccount.description: A boolean to indicate if a contact has an validation errors

HasValidationErrors.description: A boolean to indicate if a contact has an validation errors

Total.description: The total of the prepayment(subtotal + total tax)

AppliedAmount.description: The amount of applied to an invoice

RemainingCredit.description: The remaining credit balance on the prepayment

Total.description: The total of the overpayment (subtotal + total tax)

AppliedAmount.description: The amount of applied to an invoice

RemainingCredit.description: The remaining credit balance on the overpayment

CreditNoteNumber.description: ACCRECCREDIT – Unique alpha numeric code identifying credit note (when missing will auto-generate from your Organisation Invoice Settings)

Total.description: The total of the Credit Note(subtotal + total tax)

AppliedAmount.description: The amount of applied to an invoice

InvoiceAddressType.description: Indicates whether the address is defined as origin (FROM) or destination (TO)

AddressLine1.description: First line of a physical address

AddressLine2.description: Second line of a physical address

AddressLine3.description: Third line of a physical address

AddressLine4.description: Fourth line of a physical address

Region.description: Region or state of a physical address

PostalCode.description: Postal code of a physical address

Url.description: URL to the file on xero.com

IncludeOnline.description: Include the file with the online invoice

OnlineInvoiceUrl.description: the URL to an online invoice

Status.description: Need at least one field to create an empty JSON payload

DateUTC.description: UTC timestamp of creation date of branding theme

Elements.description: Array of Elements of validation Errors

BatchPaymentID.description: Unique ID for batch payment object with validation error
